about_the_game:
Re-live the mysterious experience of "The Walsingham Files: Chapter One" by purchasing the "The Walsingham Files: Chapter One" Detective's DLC Brief. Included in this DLC:

- The Director's Commentary (by the game's lead director, composer and writer Antonio Lorenzo Carino)
- A PDF of the Director's Commentary for the hearing impaired
- The game's complete original soundtrack
- A HD ready wallpaper

Tracks Included in the Original Soundtrack:

01 - Director's Commentary
02 - Bolero in the Woods
03 - New England Jazz
04 - Investigating Revere
05 - The Woods
06 - Police Station Theme

Dig deeper! Solve the mystery!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
